src:
Najstnik (19) v Metliki povozil peški, odpeljali so ju v bolnišnico
Cesto sta prečkali zunaj prehoda.
07 Nov 2019, 11:12 by N. Č.
METLIKA – Policisti so bili nekaj po 17. uri obveščeni o prometni nesreči v Metliki z udeležbo dveh pešk in voznika osebnega avtomobila.Lažje poškodovano 43- in 20-letno peško so reševalci odpeljali v bolnišnico.Ob ogledu so ugotovili, da se je nesreča zgodila zaradi nepravilnega ravnanja pešk, ki sta prečkali cesto zunaj prehoda za pešce, vanju pa je trčil 19-letni voznik osebnega avtomobila.
text:
A teenager (19) in Metlika drove on foot and was taken to hospital
They crossed the road outside the pass.
07 Nov 2019, 11:12 by N. Č.
METLIKA - Police officers were notified of a traffic accident in Metlika shortly after 5pm with the involvement of two pedestrians and a driver of a passenger car. improper handling of pedestrians crossing the road outside the pedestrian crossing and a 19-year-old car driver collided with them.
